content:
>crochet a joyful rainbow tea cozy with hibiscus flower embellishment in lily sugar n cream * yarnspirations * skill level intermediate front and back are made alike and then sewn together on the sides leaving openings for the teapot spout and handle the flower is made separately and sewn on the top of the tea cozy materials needed * lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m
contrast a hot pink 01740 1 ball
contrast b hot purple 01317 1 ball
contrast c hot blue 01742 1 ball
contrast d hot green 01712 1 ball
contrast f hot orange 01628 1 ball
contrast g red 00095 1 ball * lily® sugar n cream® scents 2 oz/56 7 g 95 yds/86 m
contrast e vanilla bouquet 24003 1 ball * size u s h/8 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge
